abstract: amazon is rolling out same-day delivery for the holidays .
article: gift procrastinators and holiday shopping mall haters , rejoice ! santa 's favorite helper just announced that it will now offer free same-day delivery until 11:59 p. m. on christmas eve for prime members . do n't worry : you do n't have to shell out the $ 99 annual fee for prime . if you sign up for a free 30-day trial of amazon prime , you 'll get two-day or same-day shipping on millions of prime-eligible items as well as prime now -- a two-hour household and grocery item delivery service -- for free . if you 're an existing prime member who lives in one of 30 metropolitan cities , you can even get thousands of items delivered to your door in an hour or less this is amazing for several reasons : first , you get unlimited deliveries with no minimum order size you also get first dibs on hard-to-get pre-order items and free release-date delivery on eligible books , games , and movies the best part ?
amazon created a shipping cheat sheet so you do n't have to guess when your holiday goodies will arrive . all you have to do now is order a bottle of wine and get to shopping .
